s: Like most have already answered, you can adjust the blades so they have a "zero-gap", resulting in a closer cut to the skin. But, you can do this with just about ANY professional clipper. I've "zero-gapped" my Wahl clippers in the past. Personally, I don't zero-gap my Andis FADE Master.
